document_data.name: Peieyrie Taskaloath
document_data.mainbody: '''Peieyrie Taskaloath''' (pronounced PEER-ee) was the co-owner of the [[Swinging Sword]] inn in [[Red Larch]] with her sister, [[Jhandlatha Taskaloath]].
document_data.Description: Like her sister, Peieyrie was venerable and down to earth.
document_data.Possessions: [[Elminster Aumar]] once stated that Peieyrie inherited unknown magical items from her father.
document_data.Personality: Peieyrie and her sister loved to hear tales of adventurers' exploits. If threatened, she would defend herself with ''[[fireball]]'' and ''[[lightning bolt]]'' spells.
document_data.History: Originally from [[Luskan]], Peieyrie and her sister lost their father who opposed the [[Arcane Brotherhood]].
